Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 24th overall pick, by Houston in 1982...
Earned first career win on 8/13/1990...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/25/1992, winning 2 games with a 1.00 ERA...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/28/1993, winning 2 games with a 1.62 ERA...
Traded from Houston to Chicago (N) on 1/31/1994 (Going to HOU: P R. Clemens, LF G. Vaughn, 2B M. McGwire. Going to CHC: 1B J. Thome, RF J. Gonzalez, RF R. Greer, P D. Wells, C E. Wedge)...
